short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens the corresponding repository from a GitHub Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that shows a page action when on a GitHub Pages website. This page action will open a popup which allows you to get quick info about the repository as well as link to it, or copy the git clone url.
